Feb 8 (Reuters) - Citigroup Global Market:

  • CITIGROUP GLOBAL MARKET AIRTEL AFRICA PLC - PRICING OF SHARES OFFERING IN AIRTEL AFRICA

  • CITIGROUP GLOBAL MARKETS: FUNDS MANAGED BY WARBURG PINCUS LLC AND MORNINGSTAR INVESTMENT SOLD OF 58 MILLION EXISTING ORDINARY SHARES IN AIRTEL AFRICA

  • CITIGROUP GLOBAL MARKETS: AIRTEL AFRICA WILL NOT RECEIVE ANY PROCEEDS FROM PLACING

  • CITIGROUP GLOBAL MARKETS - GROSS SALE PROCEEDS FROM AIRTEL AFRICA PLACING OFFERING AMOUNTED TO £81.2M, EQUAL TO 140 PENCE FOR EACH ORDINARY SHARE
